name: osrm-clean-frontend
description: Clean frontend interface for project OSRM

scripts.build: browserify -t browserify-css src/index.js --standalone osrm > bundle.raw.js && uglifyjs bundle.raw.js -c -m --source-map=bundle.js.map -o bundle.js
scripts.start: npm run build && npm run start-index

author: Nicolas Martinelli
